snippet: David Goffin, 21 and ranked 109th in the world, did not back down when he met his idol, Roger Federer, in the Round of 16 at Roland Garros.
abstract: Greg Bishop On Tennis column observes that David Goffin, ranked 109th in the world, did not back down when he met his idol Roger Federer in the French Open's Round of 16; notes that although Goffin lost, he was not steamrolled, and provided the kind of story that makes sports worth watching in the first place.
lead_paragraph: David Goffin, 21 and ranked 109th in the world, did not back down when he met his idol, Roger Federer, in the Round of 16 at Roland Garros.

headline.seo: A Tennis Star, and Maybe, a Future One
headline.main: A Star, and Maybe a Future One
headline.print_headline: A Star, and Maybe a Future One
